name: n-Body Gravity Simulator
description:
This gravity simulator utilizes Newton's Law of Universal Gravitation to dynamically attract n particles. Set a mass using the interface on the left-hand side of the screen and use your mouse to click and drag, spawning particles with an initial speed and direction. Features the ability to toggle merge on collision, allowing creation of conglomerate bodies.

Default Controls

WASDMove CameraClickSpawn ParticleClick and DragSpawn Particle with VelocityEscapeToggle Info Panel
